text:
I made a very long way since I left hight school. Originaly I wanted to be an astro-physicist, studying stars, black holes and such. In my last year in school I took an IT class and I discovered myself a passion for programming, making algorythm and games, it was a lot of fun, I've been desapointed in my final exam that my teachers did'nt understand the goal of the game I've made with my classmate. After that I was sure I wanted to be an informatician, and I made half a year before realizing it was not for me. it was a difficult moment for me since I did'nt knew what to do with my life. I went into a random BTS, following the steps of my father, and it was pretty cool, but I was conviced that it was'nt for me eather, the world of industry is'nt something that makes me wake up in the morning I would say. But it was still a great experience, I made math class for my younger classmates, who where lacking a lot of basics notions, and I really loved that. Before you know it I was in college, studying math to be a math teacher, and yet another desillusion... I was overbored with studies, I wanted to be a game designer nowthen, and I decided that I wouldn't go study again while I did'nt have a life plan that was'nt changing every six month. Here I am at Paris, a city where I bearly know anyone, to do a "service civique", for I wan't to do somthing usefull, help other. It was the best decision I ever made, I met a lot of people, made a lot of small things (but still better than nothing right ?), and the year after that I'm working in preschool with adorable little things that I don't know how to handle even a single bit. At the end of the year I know what I wan't to do, combine my thirst of knowledge, my love of teaching, and the fact that kids are the best thing in the world to become a teacher. And here I am now, that's it.
THE END
